item.title: Quartz Philosophy
item.description: Why Quartz? Hosting a public digital garden isn’t easy. There are an overwhelming number of tutorials, resources, and guides for tools like Notion, Roam, and Obsidian, yet none of them have super easy to use free tools to publish that garden to the world.
